title: DHS ACQUISITION REVIEW BOARD ACT OF 2017

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 240, S. 886.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will report the bill by title.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
The legislative clerk read as follows:

       A bill (S. 886) to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 
     to establish an Acquisition Review Board in the Department of 
     Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Daines 
substitute amendment at the desk be considered and agreed to; that the 
bill, as amended, be considered read a third time and passed; and that 
the motion to reconsider be considered made and laid upon the table.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
The amendment (No. 1582) in the nature of a substitute was agreed to.
  (The amendment is printed in today's Record under ``Text of 
Amendments.'')
  The bill (S. 886), as amended, was ordered to be engrossed for a 
third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

doc_title: DHS ACQUISITION REVIEW BOARD ACT OF 2017
